prompts: Create a plant-themed Pokemon with vibrant green leaves and a flower on its back.
I want a Pokemon that embodies nature with a sturdy body and a blooming bud.
Generate a creature resembling a dinosaur but with botanical elements and a friendly expression.
Make a unique Pokemon that combines plant and reptile features, showcasing a green color palette.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in forests, has green skin, and a flower as its highlight.
Design a Pokemon with a robust build, large leaves, and a pink flower atop its head.
Give me a Pokemon that looks like a mix of a lizard and a plant, with a gentle demeanor.
